sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './singlePost.css' export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split('/')[2]; useEffect(() => { const getPost = async ()=>{ const res = axios.get('/posts/' + path); console.log(res); } }, [path]) return (
